General.Name: Modernland Realty Ltd Tbk
General.Description: PT Modernland Realty Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, develops and sells real estate properties in Indonesia. The company engages in the industrial towns and residential projects development business; and sale of real estates and apartments, as well as offers property leasing services. It also operates and manages golf courses, club house restaurants, and hotels, as well as offers hospitality and commercial services. PT Modernland Realty Tbk was founded in 1983 and is based in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.
General.Address: Green Central City, Jakarta Barat, Indonesia, 11120
